name: Vortex Of Pain
detailed_description:
Story:
Liberate your city from a cult of simulation theory maniacs obsessed with conserving processing power.

Gameplay:
Vortex of Pain is a beat 'em up game with breakable environments and flexible gameplay influenced by wrestling in combination with classic beat 'em ups. Evasions, throws and air-grapples have a big role in the gameplay compared to most other beat 'em ups.

A controller is strongly recommended, but keyboard and mouse controls are supported also.

Features:
  • Single player and up to 4 player co-op story mode
  • Versus mode for 2-4 players
  • 4 difficulty levels and adjustable enemy counts
  • Air grapples
  • Evasions
  • Free rotation throws
  • Breakable objects
  • Character specific fighting moves such as Daria's enemy jump and Hironobu's ball roll
  • Crawling
  • Sliding
  • Randomly generated enemy names
  • Each playable character has atomic drop!
